org.apache.cassandra.cache

Class ConcurrentLinkedHashCache<K extends IMeasurableMemory,V extends IMeasurableMemory>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.cache.ConcurrentLinkedHashCache<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheSize, ICache<K,V>

    public class ConcurrentLinkedHashCache<K extends IMeasurableMemory,V extends IMeasurableMemory>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICache<K,V>
    Wrapper so CLHM can implement ICache interface. (this is what you get for making library classes final.)
